title: So my PvP.net keeps disconnecting...
body: For some reason I can't stay in the client for more than 5 minutes without getting a warning about disconnecting from PvP.net. It's been happening for a year but I'm posting now because suddenly it's happening every 30 seconds and I can't even get into a game. I have uninstalled League 3 times, Riot support has given me a bunch of stuff I've tried that have had no effect, and it's really pissing me off at this point. Can anyone help?

replies.body:
Since you're already working with a tech specialist on this, I recommend continuing to work with us in your ticket. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
